name: PHCollectionListChangeRequest
desc: A request to create, delete, or modify a Photos collection list, for use in a photo library change block.

items.name: init?(for: PHCollectionList)
items.desc: Creates a request for modifying the specified collection list.

items.name: init?(for: PHCollectionList, childCollections: PHFetchResult<PHCollection>)
items.desc: Creates a request for modifying the specified collection list, with a fetch result for tracking changes.

items.name: init?(forTopLevelCollectionListUserCollections: PHFetchResult<PHCollection>)
items.desc: Creates a request to add, remove, or rearrange child collections in the top-level collection list.

items.name: class func creationRequestForCollectionList(withTitle: String) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a request for adding a new collection list to the Photos library.

items.name: var placeholderForCreatedCollectionList: PHObjectPlaceholder
items.desc: A placeholder object for the collection list that the change request creates.

items.name: class func deleteCollectionLists(NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Requests to delete the specified asset collections.

items.name: func addChildCollections(NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Adds the specified collections as children of the collection list.

items.name: func insertChildCollections(NSFastEnumeration, at: IndexSet)
items.desc: Inserts the specified collections into the collection list at the specified indexes.

items.name: func moveChildCollections(at: IndexSet, to: Int)
items.desc: Moves the child collections at the specified indexes in the collection list to a new index.

items.name: func replaceChildCollections(at: IndexSet, withChildCollections: NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Replaces the child collections at the specified indexes in the collection list with the specified collections.

items.name: func removeChildCollections(NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Removes the specified child collections from the collection list.

items.name: func removeChildCollections(at: IndexSet)
items.desc: Removes the child collections at the specified indexes from the collection list.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The displayed name of the collection list.
